member.name: F:SleepyOwl.CommonEditor.PropertyDrawerCache.PropertyNames
member.summary: Dictionary containing short Type Name-AssemblyQualifiedName associations.

member.name: M:SleepyOwl.CommonEditor.PropertyDrawerCache.RefreshPropertyDrawers
member.summary: Rebuild associations between types and their property drawers.

member.name: M:SleepyOwl.CommonEditor.PropertyDrawerCache.HasCustomPropertyDrawer(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns true if the given type has a custom property drawer.

member.name: M:SleepyOwl.CommonEditor.PropertyDrawerCache.HasCustomPropertyDrawer(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the given type Name has a custom property drawer. Use this when only the base Name is available for a given type.
member.param: Base type Name to search for an associated propert drawer.

member.name: M:SleepyOwl.CommonEditor.PropertyDrawerCache.GetPropertyDrawer(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the of the given type's custom property drawer.

member.name: M:SleepyOwl.CommonEditor.PropertyDrawerCache.GetPropertyDrawer(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the of the given type's custom property drawer. Use this when only the base Name is available for a given type.
member.param: Base Name of the target Type.

member.name: M:SleepyOwl.CommonEditor.PropertyDrawerCache.GetPropertyDrawerName(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the AssemblyQualifiedName of the given type's custom property drawer.

member.name: M:SleepyOwl.CommonEditor.PropertyDrawerCache.DrawPropertyDrawer(UnityEngine.Rect,UnityEditor.SerializedProperty,UnityEngine.GUIContent)
member.summary: Draws a custom property drawer for the given property. If no custom property is found, will draw the default field.

member.summary: Returns the first attribute of a given attribute type on a target type.
